snippet: Iran has told diplomats that it plans to cooperate this weekend with United Nations experts investigating alleged activities that it has steadfastly denied: work on nuclear weapons.
abstract: Iran agrees to cooperate with International Atomic Energy Agency investigation into its alleged work on nuclear weapons, but negotiations remain fragile.
lead_paragraph: Iran has told diplomats that it plans to cooperate this weekend with United Nations experts investigating alleged activities that it has steadfastly denied: work on nuclear weapons.

headline.main: Iran Says It Will Cooperate With U.N. Nuclear Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Iran Says It Will Cooperate With U.N. Nuclear Inquiry
